name: Imperial Beatz Start-up
slogan: A discovery platform to share and sell originally-created sounds
description:
Imperial Beatz is a platform for producers to put out and showcase their talent and for musicians and companies to buy Instrumentals. Imperial Beatz develops and markets a scalable eCommerce marketplace for the sound and music industry to buy and sell instrumentals safely and securely by providing, personalised, easy to use, digital solutions for licensing music.

The Imperial Beatz platform helps artists, brands and instrumental producers who want to improve the soundtrack licensing and acquisition process by reducing random searches and connecting securely and directly instead. Unlike having to use Google, email, social media and generic music platforms that do not control the process.

jobs.title: CTO/Co-Founder
jobs.description:
We're currently working on an exciting music-technology start-up and we're searching for a CTO/Tech-person to take lead on the development and tech side of our business and essentially drive it forward.

Ideal candidate: 

You really know your stuff, you've got a glowing portfolio and have built a number off apps in your time. You now want to build something long-term and you want to put your name on something special and really make your mark. Here is your chance to be part of something big and build an impactful product within the music industry,


We're looking for someone passionate about joining a start-up and has a keen interest within the music industry and is dedicated to seeing projects through the entire life cycle from conception to deployment and beyond. A creative problem solver with a flexible nature, willing to adapt to the needs of a fast-paced start-up business.


Essential experience

Working in a development environment, building, testing and deploying cross-platform, responsive mobile and web applications
Working collaboratively with a team 
Graphics and UX design
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We're currently working on an exciting music-technology start-up and we're searching for a CTO/Tech-person to take lead on the development and tech side of our business and essentially drive it forward.

Ideal candidate:

You really know your stuff, you've got a glowing portfolio and have built a number off apps in your time. You now want to build something long-term and you want to put your name on something special and really make your mark. Here is your chance to be part of something big and build an impactful product within the music industry,

We're looking for someone passionate about joining a start-up and has a keen interest within the music industry and is dedicated to seeing projects through the entire life cycle from conception to deployment and beyond. A creative problem solver with a flexible nature, willing to adapt to the needs of a fast-paced start-up business.

Essential experience

Working in a development environment, building, testing and deploying cross-platform, responsive mobile and web applications
Working collaboratively with a team
Graphics and UX design
